snippet: “Human Capital,” directed by Paolo Virzì, tells a sociopolitical story through distinct chapters, each from a different point of view and in service of an overly neat-and-tidy moral.
abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie Human Capital, directed by Paolo Virzi and starring Fabrizio Benitvoglio, Fabrizio Gifuni and Valeria Bruni Tedeschi.
lead_paragraph: “Human Capital,” directed by Paolo Virzì, tells a sociopolitical story through distinct chapters, each from a different point of view and in service of an overly neat-and-tidy moral.

headline.print_headline: When Ambition, Privilege and Money Entangle Lives
headline.main: When Ambition, Privilege and Money Entangle Lives
